Human Resources Director

Ludovic Demierre, born in 1971, holds an engineering degree from the Ecole Nationale des Travaux Publics de l’Etat (ENTPE). He has spent the majority of his career within the VINCI Group, joining in 1995 as a design engineer, before becoming HR Director for VINCI Construction France for the Rhône-Alpes, Auvergne, Bourgogne and Franche-Comté region in 2002. He served as VINCI HR and Diversity Development Director from January 2014 to December 2016, when he was appointed Eurovia HR and Sustainable Development Director and joined its Executive Committee.

As of February 2021, Ludovic Demierre is Human Resources Director within the VINCI Construction pole.
